exterior.title: Driveway Resurfacing
exterior.description: Resurface the driveway to improve curb appeal and functionality. This includes repairing any cracks and applying a new layer of asphalt or concrete.

exterior.title: Landscaping and Garden Enhancement
exterior.description: Enhance the front yard with new plants, shrubs, and a small garden. Add mulch and decorative stones to improve aesthetics.

exterior.title: Backyard Patio Installation
exterior.description: Install a new patio in the backyard using pavers or stone. This creates an outdoor living space that is attractive to potential buyers.

exterior.title: Exterior Painting
exterior.description: Repaint the exterior of the house to freshen up its appearance. Choose neutral colors to appeal to a wide range of buyers.

exterior.title: Fence Replacement
exterior.description: Replace the existing fence with a new one to enhance privacy and security. Choose materials that complement the house's exterior.

living area.title: Open Concept Living Area
living area.description: Remove the non-load-bearing wall between the living room and the hallway to create an open-concept space. This will enhance the flow and make the area feel larger and more modern.

living area.title: Update Lighting Fixtures
living area.description: Replace outdated lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient LED lights. Consider adding dimmable options to create ambiance.

living area.title: Refinish Hardwood Floors
living area.description: Sand and refinish the existing hardwood floors to restore their original luster. This will enhance the overall appearance and value of the home.

living area.title: Accent Wall with Paint or Wallpaper
living area.description: Create an accent wall in the living room using a bold paint color or stylish wallpaper. This adds character and can be a focal point in the room.

living area.title: Basement Renovation
living area.description: Transform the basement into a functional living space or entertainment area. This could include adding a home theater, gym, or additional bedroom.

kitchen.title: Cabinet Refinishing
kitchen.description: Refinish the existing cabinets with a modern color to update the look without replacing them. This can significantly enhance the kitchen's appeal at a lower cost.

kitchen.title: Countertop Replacement
kitchen.description: Replace the countertops with quartz or granite to add a luxurious touch. This can modernize the kitchen and increase its value.

kitchen.title: Lighting Upgrade
kitchen.description: Install modern LED lighting fixtures to improve the kitchen's ambiance and energy efficiency. This is a cost-effective way to enhance the space.

kitchen.title: Backsplash Update
kitchen.description: Add or update the backsplash with contemporary tiles to give the kitchen a fresh look. This can be a DIY project for those with some experience.

kitchen.title: Hardware Replacement
kitchen.description: Replace cabinet handles and knobs with modern designs to give the kitchen a quick and affordable facelift.

bedroom.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
bedroom.description: Replace existing ceiling fans with modern, energy-efficient lighting fixtures to enhance the room's ambiance and appeal.

bedroom.title: Install Built-in Wardrobes
bedroom.description: Add built-in wardrobes to maximize storage space and improve the room's functionality and aesthetics.

bedroom.title: Paint and Refresh Walls
bedroom.description: Apply a fresh coat of paint in neutral tones to modernize the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

bedroom.title: Add Hardwood Flooring
bedroom.description: Replace existing flooring with high-quality hardwood to increase the room's value and appeal.

bedroom.title: Upgrade Window Treatments
bedroom.description: Install new blinds or curtains to enhance privacy and control natural light, adding to the room's comfort and style.

bath.title: Update Bathroom Fixtures
bath.description: Replace outdated faucets, showerheads, and cabinet handles with modern, water-efficient fixtures to enhance the bathroom's appearance and functionality.

bath.title: Install New Vanity and Countertop
bath.description: Replace the existing vanity with a modern design that includes a new countertop, providing more storage and a fresh look.

bath.title: Repaint and Refresh
bath.description: Apply a fresh coat of paint in a neutral color to brighten the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

bath.title: Upgrade to a Walk-In Shower
bath.description: Convert the existing bathtub into a walk-in shower with glass doors, which is a popular feature in modern homes.

bath.title: Improve Lighting
bath.description: Install new, energy-efficient lighting fixtures to enhance the bathroom's ambiance and functionality.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Finishing
unfinished basement.description: Finish the basement to create a livable space. This includes drywall installation, flooring, and painting. It can be used as a family room or additional bedroom.

unfinished basement.title: Bathroom Addition
unfinished basement.description: Add a small bathroom in the basement. This will increase the functionality of the space and add value to the property.

unfinished basement.title: Lighting Upgrade
unfinished basement.description: Install modern lighting fixtures to brighten up the basement. This will make the space more inviting and functional.

unfinished basement.title: Carpet Replacement
unfinished basement.description: Replace the existing carpet with new, durable flooring. This will improve the aesthetics and appeal of the basement.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Apartment Conversion
unfinished basement.description: Convert the basement into a legal apartment. This includes adding a kitchen, bathroom, and separate entrance. It can provide rental income and significantly increase property value.

other.title: Laundry Room Upgrade
other.description: Upgrade the laundry room with new cabinetry, countertops, and energy-efficient appliances. Add a fresh coat of paint and improve lighting to make the space more functional and appealing.

other.title: Basement Bathroom Refresh
other.description: Update the basement bathroom with new fixtures, a modern vanity, and fresh tiles. This will enhance the overall appeal and functionality of the space.

other.title: Basement Rec Room Renovation
other.description: Transform the basement rec room into a versatile living space with new flooring, paint, and lighting. Consider adding built-in storage or a small bar area to increase usability.

other.title: Storage Room Organization
other.description: Install shelving and organizational systems in the storage room to maximize space and improve functionality. This simple upgrade can make the area more appealing to potential buyers.
